detectors.description:
SilverMining._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SilverMining.sol#618-636) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SilverMining.sol#628)
detectors.markdown:
[SilverMining._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint256,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SilverMining.sol#L618-L636) uses a dangerous strict equality:
